description: Grapefruit can offset the sweetness of meringue with a welcome tartness - however, if you find normal grapefruit a little too tart, try a sweeter pink variety instead.
name: Meringue Pie Grapefruit Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the grapefruit filling into the pastry case. Top with the meringue. Bake for 10 minutes, until lightly browned. Cool the pie completely on a wire rack, before serving. Best served on the same day.
